title: Veryfine logo font
content:
Hello and thank you,

Does anyone know what font this might be? It’s most likely been customized, but maybe what they started with?  
Thank you. Much appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091213032145im_/http:/typophile.com/files/veryfine_6367.jpg)
author: mpayson

comments.content:
Maybe this started as an obliqued Times New Roman Bold, with an upside-down ’h’ as the ’y’, and of course an ’fi’ ligature.

- Lex
